articles.title: MTB Worlds: Tom Pidcock wins men's cross country - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Briton soloed to victory ahead of Sam Gaze and Nino Schurter
articles.content: Tom Pidcock put his stamp on the elite men’s cross-country race at the Mountain Bike World Championships in Glentress Forest, taking gold ahead of Sam Gaze (New Zealand) and 10-time World Champion Ni… [+3141 chars]

articles.author: Ewan Ross-Murray
articles.title: Kevin De Bruyne injury: Progress & potential return date for Man City midfielder - 90min UK
articles.description: After coming off injured after 23 minutes against Burnley in Manchester City's Premier League opener, Kevin De Bruyne may be set for an extended spell on the sidelines after suffering another hamstring injury.
articles.content: Manchester City may have made the perfect start to their Premier League campaign, but there was still cause for concern during their 3-0 win over Burnley as Kevin De Bruyne hobbled off in the first h… [+2876 chars]
